actions.text: DeFazio amendment (A007) modified by previous unanimous consent.
On agreeing to the DeFazio amendment (A007) as modified Failed by recorded vote: 178 - 250 (Roll No. 374).

description: Amendment sought to reduce funds for Ballistic Missile Defense research and development by $628 million and to use $150 million of the savings to increase the military Variable Housing Allowance program.
purpose: An amendment to reduce funds authorized in the bill for Ballistic Missile Defense research and development by $628 million and to use $150 million of the savings to increase the military Variable Housing Allowance, and reallocate the remaining savings for the variable housing allowance and to increase the Basic Allowance for Quarters.
